item.title: BBC Studios Unscripted Boss on Tom Hanks, Stanley Tucci Series and the Recipe for U.S. Success
item.description: Scale, collaborations and specialism are key ingredients that she and her team are betting on, Kate Ward, managing director, Unscripted Productions at BBC Studios Productions, tells THR.

item.title: ‘Bluey,’ BritBox International Help BBC Commercial Hit Record Revenue
item.description: “The investments made in previous years, together with a diversified portfolio, are delivering a trajectory of sustainable growth, despite ongoing global macroeconomic and geopolitical uncertainty.”

item.title: BBC Studios Posts Record $2.9 Billion Revenue, Driven by ‘Bluey’ and BritBox Growth
item.description: BBC Studios marked a banner year with record revenues of £2.2 billion ($2.96 billion) in 2024/25, up from $2.56 billion the previous year, as the U.K. broadcaster’s commercial arm capitalized on

item.title: ‘A Good Girl’s Guide to Murder’ Unveils Season 2 Cast and Sneak Peek at Emma Myers’ Return
item.description: Misia Butler, Eden Hambelton Davies and Jack Rowan will step into fan-favorite roles for the return of the hit drama, based on Holly Jackson’s bestselling novels.
